lenders.name: Bill & Yvonne

lenders.occupational_info: i help business owners get finanicing for equipment they need to grow their company

lenders.name: Bethany and Joe

lenders.name: KEVIN
lenders.loan_because: you get what you give.

lenders.occupational_info: teaching environmental responsibility

lenders.name: Nick
lenders.loan_because: My parents made many sacrifices to ensure that I received a good education.  I feel privileged that I have completed all my studies at University and am now working at one of the most innovative technology companies in the world.  I hope that my loans are able to help parents in poorer parts of the world establish their businesses so that they are able to put their children through a good education too.

lenders.name: Arlene
lenders.loan_because: It's fun.  I have lived in or visited these countries.  I find welcoming, generous people wherever I go, and this is a start at repaying some of their friendship and hospitality.

lenders.name: Matthew
lenders.loan_because: Its a great idea

lenders.occupational_info:
Dear
Check My Work
I am syed Tahir Abbas Rizvi I am calligraphy artist In order to rebuild my portfolio (I've been away from Calligraphy Paintings  for a while) I am offering sale calligraphy to individuals or galleries who have an interest in this field. I am working after the high imagine in paint word in small scale. I have my own style that I just finished calligraphy two weeks ago and I am eager to use it as well as other outstanding work. Please recommend anyone who you think is like calligraphy painting. I need people to see my work. I have a relationship with local galleries that would like to see my work and the said plan solo exhibition. Take a moment to check out examples of my work at www.namwar.com

Best Regards

syed@namwar.com
M: 0321-4190720

lenders.name: KelJean
lenders.loan_because:
My lovely wife and I dream to be financially free. While we are working towards our dream, we want to help others work towards theirs. 

Thank you KIVA for empowering us to create 'miracles' for these encouragable individuals. 
We sincerely hope in the near future, they will also join us in helping to make this world a better place.

lenders.name: Mame
lenders.loan_because: This is a fantastic program for bringing people together in a way that - small piece by small piece - improves people's lives and encourages positive changes in the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach at a university -- about art, and about the role art plays in expressing and shaping cultures.

lenders.name: shadab
lenders.loan_because: to grow my bussiness and help my society

lenders.name: Collin

lenders.name: Jane

lenders.name: Messiah Adult Group
lenders.loan_because: its a way of loving...

lenders.occupation: early retired because I suffer from schizophrenia
lenders.loan_because:

I also sponsor 6 kids and one adult in Uganda, Kenya and Nepal.
lenders.occupational_info: I am not working, unfortunately :'(

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: i think it's a brilliant idea! ... i can ... it feels good ... and it's more than words

lenders.occupational_info: I am a stay at home mother of four young children.  My spouse works while I care for the home and aid in instilling faith and character into our children.

lenders.name: Steve

lenders.occupational_info: Working hard to enjoy life.

lenders.name: Angela
lenders.loan_because: I like to help create a more equal world.
lenders.occupational_info: I work at a library where I help teenagers.

lenders.name: In Jesus Name
lenders.loan_because: everyone should have a chance to better their situation.

lenders.loan_because: It helps me feel connected to people around the world

lenders.name: Melanie

lenders.name: Rachel

I am lucky to have a good life and want to give back.

lenders.name: Kimberly

lenders.name: Joseph

lenders.name: Sharon
lenders.loan_because: We all need help sometime.  Generosity and compassion are important aspect to practice.
lenders.occupational_info: Now that I have retired from teaching school, I write articles for a newspaper.  I especially enjoy writing about people who think in different ways.

lenders.name: beHo Family
lenders.loan_because: In 1999, one of our first clients was a remarkable California-born woman living in Uganda. She had developed and was managing a micro-finance effort. I was proud to have been involved with this type of work in its infancy on the world wide web. Kiva represents, to me, the evolution of the earlier grassroots efforts of people like Christina from Life in Africa. Seeing that LiA is a Kiva lending partner makes me happy!
lenders.occupational_info: beHo is an indie web host serving small, home-based, and micro businesses. My husband and I knit and are writing a (series of)  book(s)... doing what we love, believing in each other and working toward our true right livelihood.

lenders.name: Lois
lenders.loan_because: What an awesome way to share the abundance in your life! Imagine if everyone who COULD do it DID do it...

lenders.name: Andy
lenders.loan_because: Help those less financially fortunate.
lenders.occupational_info: Model and automate complex processes.

lenders.name: THE SOORMA FAMILY

lenders.occupational_info: THE EASIEST THING IS GIVING,THE HARDEST IS RECEVING

lenders.name: James i Agnieszka

lenders.name: Bob and Fran

lenders.name: johnny

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I'm really grateful for my life, health, family and friends and I love being able to show my gratitude in this way -- helping someone else directly and making a difference in their life.

Eye-opening, intriguing, fun, and most importantly, rewarding.

lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: sitati
lenders.occupational_info: this  the  business  that  is  changing  peoples health  ang  wealth  status,however  more  ground  work  is  to  be  done  to  ,educate  them  about  what  is  happening ,health  is  paramount  ,as  it  is  the  first  asset  that  creates  others .iam  34 years  old, married  with  2  children,  and  i  depent  on  this  for  their  upkeep

lenders.name: Pierre
lenders.loan_because: I have the chance to have a comfortable life. So I am glad that my small contribution goes directly to someone that needs it for a constructive project.
lenders.occupational_info: Working in radiation protection a particle physics research laboratory

lenders.name: Siri and Astrid
lenders.loan_because: We believe in helping people so they can help themselves, not in charity alone.

lenders.name: Luther
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed and I want to bless others.
lenders.occupational_info: I take care of my children, my wife and lead the household.

lenders.name: Molly
lenders.loan_because: There but for the will of God it could be me needing help.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired after Nursing and raising a family. I enjoy gardening and growing my own vegetables.

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I like to assist people who have a good work ethic and try to improve themselves, their family, others and their country.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm retired.

lenders.name: Yolanda
lenders.occupational_info: Business development consultant

lenders.name: Sunny
lenders.loan_because: I am able.
lenders.occupational_info: I live in the mountains at 9600 ft elevation. My company provides medical grade oxygen to patients  who have trouble breathing at this altitude!

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I like giving and in this life i have been blessed so it is only right to share
lenders.occupational_info: I am the jack of all trades master of none, i must know a little about everything from A to Z!  I love my work

lenders.name: Ellenda
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people that want to help themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English to immigrants and refugees.

lenders.name: Ann
lenders.loan_because: We have so much and others have so little.  I suggest that we all keep the loans in the system, permanently!!

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: every little bit helps.

lenders.name: Trae
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others have the same opportunities that i have.
lenders.occupational_info: I go to school so i can make the money i need to keep helping.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.loan_because: empowering individuals - the most sustainable way to make our world a better place!
lenders.occupational_info: on my fourth career  - managing a quant investment fund

lenders.name: Emily
lenders.loan_because: It's important to do what you can.  These small loans not only help build businesses and improve the quality of life , they help build dignity, pride and self respect for the many people who need them.

lenders.name: Cindy
lenders.loan_because: it is the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Stephanie & Daniel
lenders.loan_because: "Pay it forward."

lenders.name: Anna
lenders.loan_because: I have more than I need and these people want a chance to improve.  Good luck out there.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in medical research.

lenders.name: Seattle Kiva Divas
lenders.loan_because: We are a group of all-girl poker players who found out about the program and decided to put our winnings to good use.

lenders.name: Nadja
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur, I know the challenges of starting or running a business.  It's great to be able to support fellow entrepreneurs in other parts of the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working with my partner on an innovative software to manage dynamic processes such as fundraising or campaigns, marketing campaigns and/or very complex sales processes,

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: Owning the means of production is essential to liberty and freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I take ideas from engineers, flesh out those ideas and place them on paper for manufacture.

lenders.name: scott
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me happy to help. 
So many people have helped me, along the way.  =)
lenders.occupational_info: I sing and play guitar. (also bass keyboard with my feet, aka 'bass pedals') I perform in bars, restaurants, private residences, etc.

lenders.name: Jennie Harris
lenders.loan_because: I want to bless others; I am considered to be in poverty in America, even so I believe God has given me so much more then I need!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a seventeen year old student. I work online as a web designer, making websites and running them.

lenders.name: Josh
lenders.loan_because: I believe that entrepreneurship is a positive step for any nation and I hope my contribution gives hope to the business owners I loan to.
lenders.occupational_info: My Company Rents and Leases Trucks.

lenders.name: Avi
lenders.loan_because: beer
lenders.occupational_info: beer

lenders.name: DeAnn
lenders.loan_because: There are good people everywhere trying to make life happen.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of young children.  Through education and opportunity my students will have better lives. I love  people and I want  to extend the opportunity  for better lives to those who are willing to work.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: it's the right thing to do. I feel that everyone that can participate should. This world would be a better place for it.
lenders.occupational_info: I run an Information Technology department. I basically play with computers all day long.

lenders.name: Logan
lenders.loan_because: This is a great opportunity to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I do accounting and consulting work for small businesses, mostly restaurants.

lenders.name: Maggie
lenders.loan_because: it feels good.
lenders.occupational_info: i take care of kids with cancer

lenders.name: Guitar Gallery
lenders.loan_because: I can and it's a great way to give back and help fellow women entrepeneurs
lenders.occupational_info: retail sales of high-end, hand made guitars

lenders.name: Traci
lenders.loan_because: I just moved back from living in Bangladesh for two years.  I have seen first hand how micro finance can help people but also how it can hurt them if not done correctly.  I am happy to see that Kiva works with partners who focus on people with the necessary skills or who work to teach people these skills so that they can be successful and improve their lives..

lenders.name: David
lenders.occupational_info: I help communities figure out their transportation systems...trains, buses, sidewalks.

lenders.name: Nicholas
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of partnering with someone for their success, even if I get no profit. there's something exciting about empowering others to succeed on their own terms.
lenders.occupational_info: I help to build companies and brands.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: I am interested in helping people from different parts of the world
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired scientist. I now enjoy teaching science to school children

lenders.name: Hunt and Callee
lenders.loan_because: We are happy to support entrepreneurship and individual hard work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a history professor and my wife is a partner in a consulting firm.

lenders.name: Tom and Lynn
lenders.loan_because: We can.
lenders.occupational_info: Lynn works in education and Tom is a picture framer.

lenders.name: DONALD
lenders.loan_because: I admire people who regardless of their difficult circumstances, are eager to do what they can to improve their lot in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I rent small storage spaces to people who haven't adequate room for their personal & household goods.

lenders.name: Barb
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do - I can't control what my government does, but I can control what I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to break computer programs so that people can fix them and make sure it can't happen again.

lenders.name: Rita
lenders.loan_because: I want others to be able to support their families like I am able to do.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise small business regarding accounting, profitability and tax management

lenders.name: Christopher
lenders.loan_because: God loans to me.

lenders.name: FAMODACA
lenders.loan_because: because we like to do something for somebody else because we have so much, and we believe that microfinancing is a very good way for people to become more self-sufficient
lenders.occupational_info: our nieces come and spend a week with us and we put on a "camp" for them-they are the campers and we the directors

lenders.name: Drayken
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a chance to succeed.  This is not a hand out but an oppourtunity to build.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a team of professionals that help businesses manage their cash flow.

lenders.name: Ellen
lenders.loan_because: I heard about this on Brotherhood 2.0 videoblog and it sounded like a great idea.

lenders.name: Maendeleo Ya Wanawake
lenders.loan_because: I have faith in the ability of women to turn the world around.

lenders.name: Mike
lenders.loan_because: I have many blessings in my life, and I would like to bless some one else.
lenders.occupational_info: I like to give back to the community, be it locally or globally.

lenders.name: Debbie
lenders.occupation: Office Manager for Interior Design Firm
lenders.loan_because: This is such a great program!  I like knowing that just a little bit can be such a big help.  Makes me happy!!
lenders.occupational_info: My job is to run the office - all the accounting, payroll, invoicing and whatever it takes to make things run smoothly!

lenders.name: jim
lenders.loan_because: because I know what it is like to need capital to start a small business. I think this is an excellent idea and I am glad to be of assistance.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell replacement windows, siding, and roofing .

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because: I want to help, I started with nothing. I purchased my first property under HUD (US gov't). I've been blessed by God and feel a need to pass my blessings on to others. I'm waiting to see how KIVA works before I invest more.
lenders.occupational_info: I invest in real estate in the US (Volusia County, Florida), buy and sell properties and have A few rental units.

lenders.name: Jess
lenders.loan_because: I have travled in Africa and seen the impact that local buisnesses have in their communities. I want to support the indipendance of people in developing countries.

lenders.name: Maureen
lenders.loan_because: I believe that making the world better happens one person at a time.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: This is a wonderful way to help others help themselves.

lenders.name: Rama
lenders.loan_because: these are real people dreaming of real change
lenders.occupational_info: Train and manage language instructors

lenders.name: Hannah
lenders.loan_because: My dad taught me to invest in people; not stocks or real estate.
lenders.occupational_info: I have the privilege of working with youth who  continually impart their wisdom to me of what it means to have determination, resiliency, and hope despite experiencing much pain in their lives

lenders.name: David Anderton
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to create a life of their own and a loan provides that. The whole world is changing because of Kiva and people like you who lend.  Creating your own success makes you feel alive. Empowered people lead to a happier, healthier and more peaceful world. If the U.S. spent hundreds of billions on microfinance rather than on wars you would feel you are in the movie "It's a Wonderful Life" at the ending for generations to come.
lenders.occupational_info: I sell real estate. Know someone selling or buying real estate in America? I will help them find a Kiva friendly Realtor who will donate $500 or more to KIVA. Just call or e-mail me and I will introduce you! How fun!

lenders.name: Carrie
lenders.loan_because: As a recent college graduate, I understand the impact my generation can have on the world. I see the people I'm lending to as an inspiration for myself; seeing that with a little drive, determination, and sometimes a little help from somebody else, I can be successful and make my positive impact on the world that much greater.

lenders.name: Trey
lenders.loan_because: Redistribution can be the only solution.
lenders.occupational_info: I serve about 170 folks as a Minister to Youth and Education

lenders.name: Tersh
lenders.loan_because: I know the value of small loans, and the value of the perspective gained by the running of  small businesses
lenders.occupational_info: I  do  remodeling of people's homes

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I think it is important to help those that are trying to help themselves.

lenders.name: marie
lenders.loan_because: it feels sooo good to give. and kiva is the best because it helps people to support themselves and to be independent.

lenders.name: Hugh
lenders.loan_because: I've started businesses and realize how important access to capital is.

lenders.name: wendy and karim
lenders.loan_because: I love it and it works, and I feel delicious.

lenders.name: David
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I like to travel, take pictures, drink wine and look at all the beauty in life

lenders.name: JEMFan
lenders.loan_because: sharing is the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Computer programmer and systems analyst.  Gardener and guinea pig servant.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I want people to have the chance for a better life.

lenders.name: Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: I like the idea of microlending.

lenders.name: William
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lenders.occupational_info: Well, I study, I learn, I do the normal things a student would do. The money I lend isn't mine, it's my fathers, but I manage our portfolio.

lenders.name: jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I am thrilled to be starting my business full time and I am passionate about sharing my success with other other business owners who are also daring to reach for a better life.
lenders.occupational_info:
Put simply, fusing glass is a process of "melting" layers of glass in a kiln to create useable and wearable art ( lots of jewlery :)
I  am endlessly captivated by glass!

lenders.name: Thomas&Sigrid
lenders.loan_because: everyone should help

lenders.name: Rashid
lenders.loan_because: With a small effort we all can make a tremendous difference in somebody's life.
lenders.occupational_info: Learning languages and doing my Masters Degree here in beautiful Istanbul.

lenders.name: Jon
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance has proven its effectiveness in fighting poverty, now it just needs to scale.

lenders.name: Lawson
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good and I like feeling good. :)
lenders.occupational_info: Marketing solution engineer, inspirational writer, husband and father.

lenders.name: Gordon
lenders.loan_because: I prefer to support individuals rather than big organizations.
lenders.occupational_info: I try to sort out the mess people get into when they use computers

lenders.name: Sawyer Family
lenders.loan_because: We are SO blessed compared to women in other parts of the world, and can pay it forward to make life better for more and more people.
lenders.occupational_info: Taking sonograms to assist doctors in treating patients/homemaker/student

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed abundantly in my life, and am able to do so without hardship.  I think it is a good cause to contribute to.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a full-time student 9 months out of the year.  School, school asignments, school groups, and friends keep me busy in my life.

lenders.name: Katherine
lenders.loan_because: I can, and I think it helps people. It's very interesting to learn more about people around the world and what they do to get by. I'm proud of the people to whom I loan money.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach university students and I do research and write books and articles. I also volunteer with the Green Party of Canada to try and bring about a sustainable future.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: I want to share some of the benefits I've had all my life with those who have had few.  I like the directness Kiva allows, letting me deal on a one-to-one basis with people worldwide.  The gift certificates are great.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a retired computer programmer, turned farmer.  We have chickens, ducks, and bees, and raise a variety of vegetables.

lenders.name: Todd & Jill
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a great way for anyone to support entrepreneurs all over the world.  A little amount of money can make a big change in a borrower's life and their business' success.
lenders.occupational_info: Todd is a graduate student in cancer biology.  Jill is a high school social studies teacher.

lenders.name: Josée
lenders.loan_because: I like to help....

lenders.name: Ifa
lenders.loan_because: Recent  U.N. Studies have shown that 90% of the worlds population are living on less than $2.00 USD a day.  And, have very little of  the  basic means for decent standard of living.  I want to help do my part.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for First Fruits Development Group.  A new enterprise of  Social Entrepreneurs.  We try to meet needs first, and worry about profits later.

lenders.name: Gerald
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy it.
lenders.occupational_info: I build houses in Tucson, Arizona and I also have a cabinet and furniture shop in Obregon, Sonora, Mexico.  I am the one in the middle.

lenders.name: Penny
lenders.loan_because: It's a great idea that really seems to work. Hats off to Nicholas Kristoff for promoting this.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm fortunate be a part of a national nonprofit that fights hate and intolerance through litigation and education and works to protect the rights of the most vulnerable in our society.

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.occupational_info: I teach students how to do mathematics

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: To assist industrious people in achieving their goals; because we who were fortunate to be born in a prosperous country should share our good fortune; because goodwill should not be constrained by borders; to improve the image of the US around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write software.  I'm married with three children - two in college and one who has graduated.  I enjoy bicycling, shooting sports,listening to jazz and reading about science.

lenders.name: SHORTY
lenders.loan_because: I AM THANKFUL THAT MY FAMILY IS HEALTHY AND DOING WELL AND I AM ABLE TO TRY TO HELP SOMEONE ELSE!

lenders.name: Susan
lenders.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance at self-sufficiency and self-esteem
lenders.occupational_info: Visit disabled and old people, help Red Cross overseas  programs, sing in church choir

lenders.name: Suzanne
lenders.loan_because: it is my spiritual practice
lenders.occupational_info: I teach life skills to students with disabilites ages 18-22.

lenders.name: Herb
lenders.loan_because: I am lucky to have been born and raised in this country rather than in the country of my ancestors.  I want to help others to help themselves attain security.
lenders.occupational_info: hospital volunteer

lenders.name: Salim
lenders.loan_because: I like to help people
lenders.occupational_info: I run a small business myself.  I help companies put their business on the Internet.

lenders.name: Jill
lenders.loan_because: I am so grateful for what I have.  As a woman and a business owner, I want to help other women who are trying to sustain and grow a business.
lenders.occupational_info: I create and advise nonprofit organizations in California.  Many of my nonprofit organization clients serve agriculture.

lenders.name: Andria R
lenders.loan_because: I am blessed.
lenders.occupational_info: I help engineers start companies in Silicon Valley, California.

lenders.name: Randall
lenders.loan_because: I believe in giving others the opportunity to strive and do better for themselves and their loved ones.

lenders.name: Jackie
lenders.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life to have awesome family and friends and they would do this for me...so it's my turn to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the title insurance industry for a major underwriter and I manage a program that allows us to provide agents with the tools and resources they need to grow their business while saving them time and money.

lenders.name: Kathy
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we all have a reponsibility to others as global citizens.

lenders.name: Josie
lenders.loan_because: I realize that a little money, in the right hands, can change lives.  I own a retail business and know that sometimes you just need a little extra to expand or upgrade.
lenders.occupational_info: I own a bookstore that sells books to children and adults.

lenders.name: julie
lenders.loan_because: I love to see what others can do with just a little help.  If we can teach one family to support themselves...we can teach the world to do the same.

lenders.name: GEE
lenders.loan_because: Lending through Kiva provides the opportunity to make a small difference in someone's life, to improve their standard of living.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: Friends helped me get through a financial crisis several years ago.  Kiva provides a wonderful way for me to "return the favor" by helping others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people manage their money in ways to enhance their well-being and financial security. It's a feel-good job!

lenders.name: Kat
lenders.loan_because: I was a Peace Corp vollunteer in Africa and I saw how a lottle can do a lot.
lenders.occupational_info: Looking for work to put my talents to use in US or elsewhere.

lenders.name: Harry
lenders.loan_because: feels good!
lenders.occupational_info: Proud member of the human race.

lenders.name: John & Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: My business was started in 1977 with a loan of $50. It grew through yearly loans for inventory for several years.  I have been successfully self-employed ever since.  I know the power of micro-finance! I want to pass on the opportunity to others.
lenders.occupational_info: It started as a knitting cottage industry, but is now sales of hand dyed yarns and knitting for charity.

lenders.name: Krankster
lenders.loan_because: I am keen to support innovative ways to help  needy make something for themselves.

lenders.name: PHI Squared
lenders.loan_because: We own a small business and I know how much everyone could use a little help to get started.
lenders.occupational_info: We help others with computer systems

lenders.name: Jonna
lenders.loan_because: I started my own business from scratch with loans from my family and others, and I want to help others become self-sufficient. Also, because my brother lived in El Salvador for 6 years, and I love the area and the people - hard working, friendly, good people that just need a break.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a doctor in a clinic, and see adults in all walks of life.  I enjoy helping people feel better, and the excitement of the puzzle of figuring out what the problems are, and how to fix them

lenders.name: Sabina
lenders.loan_because: I want to support women everywhere and it's the least I can do.....

lenders.name: Logan
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the human spirit and want to see others succeed and sustain themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and program software for computers.  I also build computers and computer networks.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: It is my privilege to invest in a small way in entrepreneurs in developing countries.   I loan a tiny fraction my abundance to empower others less fortunate than me, so that they might  prosper.  It is my privilege to invest in a small way in entrepreneurs in developing countries.

lenders.name: Birrell Walsh
lenders.loan_because: We need to share what we can.  If you are willing to work hard to create a business, I am willing to help fund it a little.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a television technician  at a Public Broadcasting System station in San Francisco, and a novelist and poet.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: I look into bodies and help "see" what is wrong.

lenders.name: Addie
lenders.loan_because: I grew up with an entrepreneurial mom, so I know how hard that lifestyle can sometimes be. Yet because of her I also know firsthand what positive effects a strong female role model can have on someone's life. That's why I'm especially excited to help these enterprising women (& men!) who are already helping themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: As a doula, I care for and help women labor and give birth to babies. I also create custom jewelry as a goldsmith. And I photograph newborn babies and families.

lenders.name: Richard & Marjorie
lenders.loan_because: We are supportive in the "micro-lending" program and found KIVA to be an attractive way for us to participate thoughout the world.
lenders.occupational_info: We were involved in the development of residential land projects thought the western states.... now enjoying travel and retirement!

lenders.name: Bryan and Alison
lenders.loan_because: We loan because it is the right thing to do and we can.

lenders.name: Marshall
lenders.loan_because: I want to change lives and teach my daughter to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I help businesses mange their assets, specifically their space, the locations where people work, and the furniture assets needed to support their work activities.

lenders.name: Beth & Aaron
lenders.loan_because: How could we NOT! What a powerful way to make a difference. We are grateful for the opportunity to give.

lenders.name: Israel
lenders.loan_because: every business needs a boost to start. I hope to give someone else a chance to support their family.
lenders.occupational_info: I develop software and design websites for many different clients. I work hard to ensure clients get an excellent end product, and we meet their expectations.

lenders.name: Julianne
lenders.loan_because: to help spread peace, health, love, and respect for all

lenders.name: Jody
lenders.loan_because: Kiva is a fantastic way to effect big changes with small capital.  It's so easy!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a self-employed computer engineer and part-time musician.

lenders.name: Margaret
lenders.loan_because: I believe the world will be a better place when there are no longer huge disparities in wealth
lenders.occupational_info: We hope to provide the scientific knowledge to enable farmers in the developing world to produce their own disease and/or drought resistant crops.

lenders.name: Jerri
lenders.loan_because: I feel like I have been so blessed. I do not have a lot of money, but where else can you truly make a difference in someone's life for as little as 25 dollars? We spend more than that on selfish pursuits. Kiva has allowed me to actually make a difference instead of just talking about it and never seeing the desire to help someone come to fruition.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Certified Provider Credentialing Specialist.(CPCS) This work is in the Medical Field and involves the granting of privileges to physicians to perform procedures in the hospital setting. I investigate their credentials to ensure that they are competent to perform the privileges they are requesting, and also keep the hospital up to government standards in the Medical Staff area.

lenders.name: Noor & Mohammed & Jenn
lenders.loan_because: we believe in change...one dollar at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: we are involved in studying languages, education, and social justice,

lenders.name: Kathi
lenders.loan_because: i can
lenders.occupational_info: I helped to process oil in remote fields above the arctic circle for 30 years,  I retired in May to care for my elderly parents and start a new chapter in my life. Peace. kb

lenders.name: Douglas
lenders.loan_because: i hope it will help.
lenders.occupational_info: Yo trabajo en una oficina, con los ordenadores. Es la vida. yo seria  mas feliz mas si pudiera hacer marionetas

lenders.name: George
lenders.loan_because: Its amazing to me what can be done with a small amount of money by an enterprising hard working person. If this small investment can enable someone to be self-sufficient then I'm happy to be part of that effort.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an organization that protects what many consider to be one of the oldest rivers in the world. We defend the river from threats, permanently protect land around the river and restore eroded river banks.

lenders.name: Gail
lenders.loan_because: This is a way for people in the U.S. to support others working for better lives around the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I raise and distribute funds for a foundation to support local people working to solve social and environmental problems.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: I was blessed with the ability and opportunity to provide more for myself than I need.  I want to share the extra I have with others in the hope that they can someday have the same fortune and help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I make computer programs that help people share experiences and information with each other.

lenders.name: Bob & Jackie
lenders.loan_because: We think it is terribly important for poorer people to be able to receive loans to give them a chance for a better life - and to be able to do it directly and know a bit about the recipients is great!  Thank you for allowing us to participate in making this happen.
lenders.occupational_info: We both are teachers and counselors in the field of psychology (what we think, what happens to us, and how we feel about everything).

lenders.name: Lindsay & Seth
lenders.loan_because: Pay it forward!

lenders.name: Jamie
lenders.loan_because: From each according to their need, to each according to their ability.

lenders.name: Jean & Gary
lenders.loan_because: We've always been  hard workers & savers and are eager to help others who do the same.  When we have managed  to climb a step,  we want to reach back, and lend a helping hand to the next person.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired Office Mgr & Purchasing Mgr.   We now work as  volunteers, building homes for low-income families and repairing homes for the elderly on Arizona Indian reservations.

lenders.name: Belinda
lenders.loan_because:
It makes me feel good.

lenders.loan_because: ...it feels great to help someone out; and now, through Kiva, there's a way to reach across the world and lend a hand without having to be Bill Gates.

lenders.name: Philip & Andrea
lenders.loan_because: It feels good to know who the  individual is that I am trying to help.
lenders.occupational_info:
I am retired and keep bees in my back yard in San Francisco. My wife is a social worker for SF. She helps
adults that report abuse, whether  emotional, physical, or financial.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.loan_because: I am so excited to be a part of this project and doing something positive in a world that is hungry for positive growth!
lenders.occupational_info: I (Alex) am a musician in the Western Classical style.  I preform in Western Opera and also am the cantor at a synagogue, meaning the musical leader during worship in Jewish Temples.

lenders.name: Mitesh
lenders.loan_because: I want to give back to the world, and spend some of my time and money on helping others in their personal quests in life, in a way that enables them to feel free and to strengthen their relationships. Hoarding all my money for a house or a potential future family is just not wise at this time in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: Measure and ensure quality for software used in spectrum analyzers. (Spectrum Analyzers are primarily used for developing cell phones and other communication devices).

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: Each dollar I spend here does more than do dollars spent on other programs, and I can watch it happen.  I like the way I can choose to make donations for overhead too.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a retired biologist.

lenders.name: Vicki
lenders.loan_because: Hard working people sometimes need a supportive hand to get started, or to improve their business.  I'm trying to start my own small business on the side to supplement my income. It's slow going due to lack of time, but I'll make it!
lenders.occupational_info: I help frail, low-income elderly avoid going into nursing homes.

lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Thorsten
lenders.loan_because: I can.

lenders.name: Scotty & Becca
lenders.loan_because: encouraging entrepreneurs is the most effective way to fight poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: We're Americans living in Paris and studying French. We've been expats for over four years, having spent the last four in Edinburgh. We're excited about our new adventure in France

lenders.name: Neil
lenders.loan_because: I'm a libertarian who believes that gov't shouldn't fund charity...but individuals should.

lenders.name: Benjamin
lenders.loan_because: As an entrepreneur in the United States my experience has opened my eyes to the struggles of small businesses. It takes a lot of character to hold true to the goal. In less fortunate areas of the world, I feel charity does not harbor progress. It will ease some pain for a time but charity is no cure. Someone once said, “Give a man a fish, feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish, feed him for life.” I would add “Loan them some capital to get a fleet of boats, and watch as they feed their people.”
lenders.occupational_info: I work on computer applications, allowing for information to flow faster to where it needs to go.

lenders.name: Maria
lenders.loan_because: I have also work very hard, came to the USA 34 years ago with $25.00    on me, and with child( in photo w/me). I did find  helping hands. I 'm proud to give back.
lenders.occupational_info: For the last  28 years I work six days a week  most of the time twelve hours a day, selling  residential properties along with my daughter in the Washington  D.C. area.

lenders.name: Daniel
lenders.occupational_info: I take the different parts of a film and weave them together into a story with the cooperation of the director.

lenders.name: Bradley
lenders.loan_because: I am just grateful for the opportunity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am researching how hearts form in babies in the hope of finding ways to prevent heart defects in future generations.

lenders.name: Frank
lenders.loan_because: It makes fun to help

lenders.name: Shelly
lenders.loan_because: We are all equal, and I just happen to be lucky enough to have what I need.  I want to share with individuals working against the odds to make their lives and communities better.

lenders.name: giddy giddy
lenders.loan_because: My participation in KIVA lending is just one of the few ways that I can "pay it forward."

lenders.name: Richard
lenders.loan_because: It makes the world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I do many things, among them negotiating with the government in Arizona about laws that are being made.  I also teach businesses in Arizona what the laws are that effect how they do business.

lenders.name: Vivi & Rance

Try to make the world a better place little by little. We're a recycling, reusing, hybrid drivin' & treehuggin' couple.

lenders.name: Lynn & Victor
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: My husband and I have been working to make our environment cleaner and healthier for the past 30 years.  I manage all environmental work done in our schools so that children don't get exposed to lead and asbestos.  My husband works to restore environments that have been damaged by industrial pollution

As an entrepreneur I know how hard beginning can be, especially when you have no money or help to count on. 
I've been lucky and wanna share my luck with someone who really wanna make it.

My core business is sport marketing. In two words I match big companies to worldwide famous athletes, teams and/or events.
I also run other businesses but we're not here to talk about me...

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship and the ability of people to be in control of their own lives.  This helps people raise their standard of living and encourages their children to take part in the process
lenders.occupational_info: I teach entrepreneurship to college students as well as hold seminars to teach women how to start businesses. This is my passion - to help other women achieve independence

lenders.name: Michael
lenders.loan_because: "The development or destruction of man's mind, body and spirit depends upon external stimuli" Natsume Soseki. I believe support should be given to others with the desire and determination to improve their lives.
